game.title: Tornado.io 3 – Battle Arena
game.tagline: Spin into the ultimate tornado battle!
game.description: Tornado.io 3 – Battle Arena throws you into explosive, fast-paced matches where you control a powerful tornado with one goal: grow, evolve, and out-destroy everyone in the arena! Pick from a roster of unique tornado types — Wind, Fire, Ice, and many more coming soon — each with special abilities that change the flow of battle. Tear through streets, farms, beaches, forests, and other vibrant maps packed with things to consume. The more you absorb, the bigger, faster, and stronger your tornado becomes!
features: Multiple unique tornado types with special abilities (Wind, Fire, Ice, and more)
Diverse maps including streets, farms, beaches, and forests
Dynamic growth system - absorb objects to become bigger and stronger
Multiple exciting game modes for varied gameplay
Progression system with unlockable tornadoes and upgradeable abilities
Vibrant visuals with satisfying destruction effects

gameModes.name: Total Destruction
gameModes.description: Destroy the most objects you can while other tornadoes compete to do the same. Be the one that destroys the most objects to win!
gameModes.objective: Destroy more objects than any opponent

gameModes.name: Total Solo Destruction
gameModes.description: The map is your playground and there's no one to bother. You are free to destroy as much as you can. The more you destroy, the more you earn.

gameModes.name: Deathmatch
gameModes.description: Seek and destroy other tornadoes in an all-out fight for survival. Eliminate as many opponents as possible to win!
